nodes.bodyText: Can we use a test prefix for this method. Something like testIsMining.
Maybe we should test more options. Maybe I'm doing something wrong, but I've changed the logic of isMining method backwards and the test passed anyway.

@jiripetrlik
Hi. Can't follow exactly what you mean.
I reverted "ApplyPmmlModelCommand.java" and run the same test. But it did not fail. So, it seems to me that it does not test your changes. Or maybe I'm doing something wrong.

@gitgabrio
Thank for your explanation about this offline. As logic did not change I think it is ok.
